settings.title: Settings
settings.restartNeeded: Need to restart the tool to take effect

tooltip.btn_reset: Need to restart the tool to take effect
tooltip.playbackDeviceDesiredLatency: The delay for playing after the instructions arrive at the device, if this value is very small, the sound may be weird. Meanwhile a big delay may affect the experience
tooltip.logLevel:
Set the log level, the more severe the level, the less information will be shown
Notice: In testing version, this option doesnot take effect, the log level is always DEBUG
tooltip.warnIfPortMismatch: Show warning dialog if the game UDP port mismatch with the tool UDP port
tooltip.hudFPS: Lock FPS of the in-game hud, high FPS may bring negative influence to the performance of some screen recording softwares like OBS
tooltip.playGoSound: Just after the count down, there will be something like 'Go' played if this option was checked
tooltip.collision_slight: When speed drops suddenly so much, play the collision voice (slight)
tooltip.collision_medium: When speed drops suddenly so much, play the collision voice (medium)
tooltip.collision_severe: When speed drops suddenly so much, play the collision voice (severe)
tooltip.playWheelAbnormalSound: Play special voice for wheel puncture, maybe not accurate for different wheels
tooltip.useDefaultSoundPackageForFallback: If current voice package is not complete, use default AI-generated voice package for fallback
tooltip.preloadSounds: Preload the voice packages may take more memory (around 2GB), but will load the voice package as soon as possible
tooltip.additionalCoDriverPackagesSearchPath: When searching for voice packs, additionally search this folder
tooltip.additionalPacenotesDefinitionSearchPath: Put addition *.csv files here according to the format of the Pacenote definition file (pacenotes.csv)
tooltip.useSequentialMixerToHandleAudioConflict: A sequential mix can avoid voices overlap
tooltip.useDynamicPlaybackSpeed:
In some maps with dense pacenotes (such as Scotland), by dynamically adjusting the speech rate of the current pacenote segment according to the speed of the vehicle and the position of the next pacenote,
 to avoid the situation that the pacenote cannot keep up with the car
tooltip.useTempoInsteadOfRate: Using the Tempo method can ensure that only the voice is accelerated or slowed down, while keeping the pitch unchanged, using the Rate method will cause the pitch to change (weird)
tooltip.dynamicPlaybackMaxSpeed: When dynamically adjusting the speech rate, it does not exceed this multiple. For example, if it is set to 2.0, then the maximum speech rate is x2.0
tooltip.useDynamicVolume: It will judge the degree of tension according to the current speed and perform sine wave disturbance on the voice
tooltip.dynamicVolumePerturbationFrequency: The frequency of the sine wave, the higher the frequency, the faster the jitter
tooltip.dynamicVolumePerturbationAmplitude: The larger the amplitude, the stronger the jitter
tooltip.hudTopMost: The hud will always be on top of any window in the system.
tooltip.hudChromaKeyMode:
Need to restart the tool.
After the full-screen game mode is turned on, you can add "ZTMZ Club Hud" window capture in OBSStudio, plus a chroma keying filter, which can be used as a transparent mask layer for live broadcast or video recording
Note, do not turn this option on if it is a windowed game, in addition, the color scheme after opening will be slightly different from that when windowed
tooltip.hudShowTelemetry: Dashboard similar to Dirt Telemetry Tool
tooltip.hudSizePercentage: The ratio of the dashboard to the height of the game screen
tooltip.hudPaddingH: The distance between the elements in the dashboard and the borders on both sides of the dashboard
tooltip.hudPaddingV: The distance between the elements in the dashboard and the upper and lower boundaries of the dashboard
tooltip.hudElementSpacing: Spacing between elements within the dashboard
tooltip.hudSectorThicknessRatio: The width of sector elements in the dashboard, such as speedometer, tachometer, etc.
tooltip.hudBackgroundOpacity: Dashboard background transparency, the lower the more transparent
tooltip.hudTelemetryShowGBall: G-force balls can help understand the current inertial dynamics of the vehicle
tooltip.hudTelemetryShowSpdSector: The speedometer shows the current real-time speed of the vehicle, not the wheel speed
tooltip.hudTelemetryShowRPMSector: The tachometer shows the current speed of the engine
tooltip.hudTelemetryShowGear: Display in the form of H gear, the upper left corner is R gear
tooltip.hudTelemetrySteeringDegree: The angle through which the steering wheel passes from one side limit to the other side limit
tooltip.hudTelemetryShowSuspensionBars: Wheel speed (green), brake temperature (red), suspension position (white) and suspension speed (blue)
tooltip.hudShowDebugTelemetry: Displays all telemetry data on the left side of the game screen for debugging and problem diagnosis
tooltip.enableGoogleAnalytics:
Use Google Analytics to collect some of your "usage information" to help us improve the program. All of this information is sent to Google servers in an anonymous form for statistical use. You can allow or prohibit this in the settings at any time. This information includes and is limited to:
	- Operating system version
	- Opening this program event
	- Opening each window event in this program
	- Each configuration item modification event
 	- The modification event of the main interface configuration item
	- The event of using a specific voice package to play the game (to count the voice package preference)
tooltip.optInBetaPlan: Turn on this option to recieve updates and new features in the beta version
tooltip.udpListenPort: If you want to use this tool along with SIMHUB, changing the default 20777 to 20778 would help
tooltip.udpListenPort_Warning: The port is not consistent with the Dirt Rally 2.0 settings {0}, maybe you're using SIMHUB
tooltip.memoryRefreshRate: Change this value to adjust the refresh rate of the memory monitor

settings.warnIfPortMismatch: Show warning dialog if port mismatch
settings.hudFPS: In-game Hud FPS, changes need restarting this tool to take effect
settings.playGoSound: Play special voice when the race started
settings.playWheelAbnormalSound: [Experimental] Play special voice for wheel puncture
settings.useTempoInsteadOfRate: Use tempo instead of rate for playback rate adjustment
settings.hudTopMost: Always on top of all windows
settings.hudChromaKeyMode: Whether to use chroma keying mode (for full-screen game recording or live streaming)
settings.hudShowTelemetry: Whether to show the telemetry dashboard
settings.hudTelemetryShowGBall: Dashboard - Whether to display G-force ball or not
settings.hudTelemetryShowSpdSector: Dashboard - whether to show the speedometer
settings.hudTelemetryShowRPMSector: Dashboard - whether to show the tachometer
settings.hudTelemetryShowPedals: Dashboard - Does it show pedal status (clutch, brake, throttle)
settings.hudTelemetryShowSteering: Dashboard - whether to show steering wheel status
settings.hudTelemetryShowSuspensionBars: Dashboard - Whether to show tire and suspension status
settings.optInBetaPlan: Opt in to the beta plan

portNotOpen.title: Port Not Open
portNotOpen.content: We detected the UDP port in your game "{0}" settings located in {1} is not enabled, which is necessary for the tool to work correctly, please click 'OPEN IT' button below, we'll enable it for you, and then restart your game. Or click 'Cancel' to exit the tool.

portMismatch.title: Port Mismatch
portMismatch.ckbox_show: Do not show this dialog next time
portMismatch.content:
Your game "{0}" settings located in {1} is not correct, the port definition {2} is mismatched with the settings {3} in our tool, which would lead to unsuccessful track recognition. 

	(1) Maybe you're using SIMHUB, which allows udp port forwarding. If so, please select 'OK' below to keep the settings untouched.

	(2) Or you dont know what is going on and you're confused with this dialog, then just click 'FORCE REPARATION', we'll handle it automatically. Then don't forget to restart the game.

resetConfig.title: Reset All Configuration
resetConfig.content: You're going to reset all the configuration to default, are you sure? After selecting 'OK', the changes need restarting the tool to take effect.

newUpdate.title: New Update
newUpdate.content: We got a brand new version {0} available comparing to your current version {1}, do you want to update?

enableGoogleAnalytics.title: Improve user experience
enableGoogleAnalytics.content:
This program wants to use Google Analytics to collect some of your "usage information" to help us improve the program. All of this information is sent to Google servers in an anonymous form for statistical use. You can allow or prohibit this in the settings at any time. This information includes and is limited to:
	- Operating system version
	- Opening this program event
	- Opening each window event in this program
	- Each configuration item modification event
 	- The modification event of the main interface configuration item
	- The event of using a specific voice package to play the game (to count the voice package preference)

scriptNotExist.title: Script does not exist
scriptNotExist.content: There is no custom pacenote script, do you want to create one? Note: After creating, the original rbr game pacenote may not be available. If you want to restore the original rbr pacenote, just delete the newly created script file.

tooltip.rb_record:
The mode switch must be possible when the game state is Unknown (not in the game)

Pure voice mode:
After the game in the recording mode starts, you can press F1 to record the road book fragment, and press F4 to end the road book fragment recording
in the game When the countdown starts, you can also pause the game and record the game start voice. The start voice can only record one segment, and it will be played at the beginning of the countdown during playback. It will be recorded as "-2.wav" file in the map folder

Automatic script mode:
Please keep the computer quiet in this mode, no QQ, Thunder, browser video, etc. may emit sounds for voice recognition The software that has an impact is running
tooltip.rb_replay: Mode switching must be possible when the game state is Unknown (not in the game). After the game in play mode starts, if there is a road book corresponding to the map, it will automatically play the recorded road book fragment after arriving at the specified location
tooltip.tb_gameState:
Current game state
RaceBegin: The game starts counting down
Racing: Running
Paused: Paused
RaceEnd: Game over
Unknown: Unknown state
tooltip.tb_time: Game time, may not be accurate
tooltip.tb_speed: Driving speed, unit: kilometers per hour
tooltip.tb_posZ: The position Z of the vehicle
tooltip.tb_currentProfile: In the profiles folder of the program folder, it is divided into different configurations according to the folder. Multiple sets of books can be recorded, and the configuration cannot be switched during the game.
tooltip.tab_pa_isRecording: In the recording mode, in the game (RaceBegin, Racing, Paused), press the F1 key to start recording the road book fragment, and press the F4 key to stop recording the road book fragment
tooltip.cb_rq_low:
Low-quality recording, small files, easy to share
Low EQ: the sound may be distorted
High EQ: walkie-talkie effect (YES)
tooltip.cb_rq_high:
High-quality recording with larger files
retains a lot of sound details and is more realistic
tooltip.tab_s_isDynamic: Determine whether to play dynamically according to the @dynamic switch in the script file
tooltip.tab_s_author: Author of the current track script pacenote
tooltip.tab_s_listenDevice: The currently monitored device in automatic script recording mode
tooltip.tb_replayDevice: Do not switch the playback device while the game is in progress
tooltip.btn_currentScript: Open the script of the current track
tooltip.btn_currentCodriver: Open the folder of the current codriver package
tooltip.btn_currentCodriverLink: Open the homepage of the current codriver package author
tooltip.tb_playVolume: Adjust the playback volume. When the volume is increased, distortion caused by loss of audio waveform may occur
tooltip.tb_prePlay: For example, +1s means Lushu will play 1 second later, -2s means Lushu will play 2 seconds earlier
tooltip.tb_replayMode: The play mode cannot be switched while the game is in progress
tooltip.tb_playbackSpd: Fixed speech rate adjustment, which can be superimposed with dynamic adjustment speech rate
tooltip.tb_recordMode: The play mode cannot be switched while the game is in progress
tooltip.tb_autoScriptRecordMode: Automatically record scripts through voice recognition
tooltip.tb_showHud: Whether to display the floating window in the game, the game needs to be in window mode or borderless window mode

portAlreadyInUse.title: Port Already In Use
portAlreadyInUse.msg:
Port {0} is IN USE，please check if there's any program like SIMHUB，速魔软件，Dirt Telemetry Tool running, if so, try to solve this issue by UDP Port Forwarding function in SIMHUB
See in details (Chinese): https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1oq4y1u7ua?p=2
